Key Match Events: Marco Jansen made an unbeaten 75 off 42 balls
Klaasen and Jansen helped South Africa plunder 143 runs in the last 10 overs
England was dismissed for 170 in only 22 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler said, 'There is no room from here on. It is going to be incredibly difficult [to qualify for the semifinals]. We haven't left ourselves any margin, but we have belief.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klaasen hit 12 fours and four sixes overall
South Africa scored 7-399 after being put into bat in stifling conditions in Mumbai
England's loss leaves them second last on the table, ahead of only Afghanistan
